Text:
i downloaded this to see if i would like the series, and was planning on downloading the HD version later if i did.
however this is in surprisingly high quality, no compression artifacts, and small file sizes

if the rest is the same as the first episode, then downloading the HD version is a waste of bandwith

hope to see more from you sharips :)
need more seeds :C its been 2 days and its not done
Everything except the first two episodes are missing an audio channel.
for some reason only the first two episodes have audio. can someone please tell me what happened?
